roleset.name: not relying on, freestanding
roleset.note: INDEPENDENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, depend.01. Corresponds to VNcls rely-70. (from independent.01-j)

example.name: arg0
example.text: I was also annoyed by a woman in the audience who said Scotland should be independent -LRB- she was English -RRB- because " all countries should be independent " , including Wales and " Ireland " .
example.arg: because "all countries should be independent", including Wales and " Ireland "

example.name: both args
example.text: Caribbean reef development was independent of coral diversity over 28 million years..
